title: LB Blockhead
summary: Developed an Admin Dashboard for LBBlockhead.com using Filament with Laravel and Livewire for dynamic, real-time features.
details:
• Project Overview: Developed an Admin Dashboard for LBBlockhead.com using Filament with Laravel and Livewire for dynamic, real-time features.
  • Key Responsibilities: Built and customized the admin interface to manage user data, transactions, and other backend operations efficiently. Integrated Livewire for real-time data updates and interactions without page reloads. Designed an intuitive, responsive dashboard with streamlined navigation and enhanced data visualization tools.
  • Technologies Used: Laravel, Filament, Livewire, PHP, HTML, TailwindCSS .
  • Achievements: Delivered a robust, high-performance admin dashboard, improving backend operations and providing a smooth user experience.
